incidents.name: New TwiML Processor Migration Caused Change in Behavior for <Record> Transcribe Attribute

incident_updates.body: Twilio Programmable Voice 'Recording Transcriptions' service was degraded between 07/21/2023 and 08/05/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced issues with transcriptions not being generated for calls that were passing transcribeCallback attribute and not passing transcribe attribute in the Record verb. The new TwiML processor migration change has been reflected in the Programmable Voice documentation. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Authy API unavailable for 2.5 minutes

incident_updates.body: Twilio Authy API and Authy APP was degraded for 2.5 minutes between 16:09:41 and 16:12:11 UTC on 08/12/2024. During the timeframe, the API experienced a significant number of failed requests due to DB connectivity issues. As a result, some customers were unable to initiate or verify their verifications and fetch the status about approval requests. In regard to the app's side, some end-users may have encountered errors in the Authy app. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Increased Rate of 500 Errors for Twilio Programmable Messaging API

incident_updates.body: Twilio Programmable Messaging API was degraded between 02:09 to 02:11 Pacific Time on 02/08/2024 and 18:06 to 18:08 Pacific Time on 04/08/2024. During this period, customers may have experienced increased latencies and 500 errors. The issue has now been resolved.

Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with AWS Increased rate of 500 errors for Twilio Programmable Messaging API. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.
